mapper.select: SELECT ranf.id, ranf.relation_id as relationId, ranf.company_office_id as companyOfficeId, ranf.post_id as postId, ranf.work_place as workPlace, ranf.noise_source as noiseSource, ranf.noise_protection_facilities as noiseProtectionFacilities, ranf.operation_and_maintenance as operationAndMaintenance, sco.`office_name` AS companyOfficeName FROM `record_anti_noise_facilities_data` ranf, sys_company_office sco WHERE ranf.`company_office_id` = sco.`id` AND ranf.`relation_id` = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
